name: Road Crossing Adventure
description:
Road Crossing Adventure is the best road crossing survival game. The addictive game-play will keep you coming back for more and more. Help different animals of jungle to full their belly with yummy coins that you will find all across the jungle. Help the helpless animals like FROGGY, PIGGY, DOGGY, GOATY, TURTLE, KOALA, SHEEP & DUCK to cross the jungle full of static and moving hurdles.
GAME FEATURES:
- Endless Jungle with Beautiful Animals
- Amazing Graphics and Cool Sound Effects
- 8 Different Animals you can select
- Smooth and Easy Gameplay Controls

Play and let your friends and family play this game and challenge your friend with your highest score.
For any suggestion/feedback feel free to contact us at gamingport559@gmail.com
